ComicInfo.Summary:
"World's End" part 1! As a reality storm rages, travelers take shelter at the World's End tavern and share stories. Up first, "A Tale of Two Cities," where a city dweller discovers the city of his dreams...or is it really the dreams of his city?
The story starts with a man and a woman, who wind up being victims of a peculiar storm. They go seek shelter from an inn, called Worlds end. In there, all that you can do actually, is eat, drink, and listen to wonderful and weird stories told by all of its guests. The first story is told by a man, who heard it from another man. It`s the tale of one city's dream.
